00024 #ifndef UVM_FACTORY_H
00025 #define UVM_FACTORY_H
00026 
00027 #include "base/uvm_ids.h"
00028 
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <iostream>
00031 
00033 
00034 namespace uvm {
00035 
00037 
00038 // forward declarartions of necessary classes
00039 
00040 class uvm_object;
00041 class uvm_component;
00042 class uvm_factory_rep;
00043 class uvm_object_creator;
00044 class uvm_component_creator;
00045 
00047 
00048 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 //
00050 // CLASS: uvm_creator
00051 //
00052 // Provides the interface used for registering proxy classes with the
00053 // factory which is necessary for creating such proxy classes from 
00054 // the factory.
00055 // The two different kinds of classes that are supported by the factory
00056 // are uvm_component and uvm_object.
00057 //
00058 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 
00065 class uvm_creator {
00066 public:
00067   virtual ~uvm_creator();
00068   virtual void *                 create_class(const std::string& name = "") = 0;
00069   virtual uvm_object_creator*    as_object_creator();
00070   virtual uvm_component_creator* as_component_creator();
00071 protected:
00072   uvm_creator();
00073 };
00074 
00075 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 //
00077 // CLASS: uvm_object_creator
00078 //
00079 // Implements the interface used by the factory to create an uvm_object.
00080 // Derives from uvm_creator.
00081 // Usually, the UVM_OBJECT_UTILS macro in an uvm_object defines the
00082 // corresponding uvm_object_creator class. 
00083 //
00084 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 
00091 class uvm_object_creator : public uvm_creator {
00092 public:
00093   uvm_object_creator();
00094   virtual uvm_object* create(
00095     const std::string& name = ""
00096   ) = 0;
00097   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { return create(name); }
00098   virtual ~uvm_object_creator();
00099   virtual uvm_object_creator* as_object_creator();
00100 };
00101 
00102 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 //
00104 // CLASS: uvm_component_creator
00105 //
00106 // Implements the interface used by the factory to create an uvm_component.
00107 // Derives from uvm_creator.
00108 // Usually, the UVM_COMPONENT_UTILS macro in an uvm_object defines the
00109 // corresponding uvm_component_creator class. 
00110 //
00111 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 
00118 class uvm_component_creator : public uvm_creator {
00119 public:
00120   uvm_component_creator();
00121   virtual uvm_component* create(
00122     const std::string& name = ""
00123   ) = 0;
00124   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { return create(name); }
00125   virtual ~uvm_component_creator();
00126   virtual uvm_component_creator* as_component_creator();
00127 };
00128 
00130 
00131 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 //
00133 // CLASS: uvm_factory
00134 //
00135 // Class for creating uvm_objects and uvm_components. 
00136 // Before creation, the factory processes any overrides, if applicable. 
00137 // Class types  have to be registered with the factory using the 
00138 // uvm_creator class.
00139 // A singleton factory instance is created for a given simulation run.
00140 //
00141 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142 
00148 class uvm_factory {
00149 public:
00150 
00151   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152   // Register an object or a component with the factory. 
00153   //
00154   // Usually, the UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER and UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER macros 
00155   // will invoke these factory member methods to register a particular 
00156   // object or component with the factory.
00157   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00158 
00159   static int register_class_creator(
00160     const std::string & type_name, 
00161     uvm_creator* creator
00162   );
00163   static int register_uvm_object_creator(
00164     const std::string & type_name, 
00165     uvm_object_creator* creator
00166   );
00167   static int register_component_creator(
00168     const std::string & type_name, 
00169     uvm_component_creator* creator
00170   );
00171   
00172   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00173   // Create an uvm_object or an uvm_component through the factory.
00174   //
00175   // Overrides are applied before creation.
00176   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 
00178   static uvm_object* create_uvm_object(
00179     std::string type_name,
00180     std::string inst_path = "",
00181     std::string name = "",
00182     bool no_overrides = false
00183   );
00184   static uvm_component* create_component(
00185     std::string type_name,
00186     std::string inst_path = "",
00187     std::string name = ""
00188   );
00189   static void* create_registered_class(
00190     const std::string & type_name
00191   );
00192 
00193   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194   // Set up type overrides or instance overrides through the factory.
00195   //
00196   // Wildcards('*' and '?') are allowed in "inst_path" of instance overrides.
00197   // Instance overrides have precedence over type overrides.
00198   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00199 
00200   static void set_type_override(
00201     std::string orignal_type_name,
00202     std::string replacement_type_name,
00203     bool replace = true
00204   );
00205   static void set_inst_override(
00206     std::string inst_path,
00207     std::string orignal_type_name,
00208     std::string replacement_type_name
00209   );
00210 
00211   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00212   // Print all overrides in the factory.
00213   //
00214   // Useful for debugging purposes.
00215   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00216 
00217   static void print_all_overrides(); // for debugging use
00218 
00219   // methods primarily for internal use
00220 
00221   static std::string get_type_override(
00222     std::string orignal_type_name
00223   );
00224   static std::string get_inst_override(
00225     std::string inst_path,
00226     std::string orignal_type_name
00227   );
00228   //
00229   static bool is_component_registered(const std::string & type_name);
00230   static bool is_uvm_object_registered(const std::string & type_name);
00231   static bool is_class_registered(const std::string & type_name);
00232 protected:
00233   static uvm_factory_rep* m_rep; // internal implementation class
00234 };
00235 
00237 
00238 } // namespace uvm
